definitions: To select actors for a play or film.
To shape metal or plastic by pouring into a mold.
To direct one's eyes or a glance.
To shed or discard skin, a shell, or antlers.
examples: The fisherman will cast his net.
They will cast the roles next week.
The artist will cast the sculpture in bronze.
She cast a quick glance at him.
The snake will cast its skin.
